section.title: Integration Guide
section.t: This appendix provides guidance for integrating the Proof of Process framework with existing content management systems.

section.title: Text Editor Integration
section.t: Text editors and word processors can integrate PoP evidence collection through a local daemon process. The daemon:

list.t: Listens for editing events via the editor's extension API.
Aggregates events into evidence windows of configurable duration (RECOMMENDED: 30 seconds).
Computes behavioral features (typing cadence, revision patterns, pause distributions) for each window.
Seals the evidence packet with a Sequential Work Function proof and the device attestation key.

section.title: Version Control Integration
section.t: For version-controlled documents, the PoP framework can attach evidence metadata to commits. Each commit message MAY include a reference to the corresponding evidence packet hash, enabling third-party verification of the authorship process for each committed change.
